vsParam:
... Hey, Master Peppermint.
Could you please answer me a question?

It's OK to show Nelke the items made by [px].
After all, observation is very important.

But why did you make a "Frightening uni"
and have it delivered to me???

Hey~ Master Peppermint~???
When will it explode? It seems it will blow up anytime~

Eek!? J-just... for fun... No!
Right, that's because I trust you, Hazel!

Y-yeah! Trust! Look! What you said just now proves
you know every detail about the use of items!

No!
It's because items could be used for good or evil!

So it should be applied by the right people!
I chose Hazel so as to show Nelke about this!
I see...! Indeed, Hazel is able to use any item at ease!
Hee hee, good for the Student Union President!!

Hehe...
I hope you are not being mischievous, huh?

Well, kind of.
For me, I prefer assistance items...

Ahem. Anyway, I'm their master!
So I chose Hazel, who is almighty and excellent!

I didn't choose you to tease you!
Please don't get me wrong!

S-speaking of which... Remember, Nelke. You should
think it over before deciding whom you want to give your items to.
You can't toss aside all the items after you make them!
Got it. I'll keep that in mind!

OK.
... [px], well done. You made quality items. Good for you.

Heehee, after all, [px] is with me!
It's no big deal~

Yeah. Between [px] and Master Peppermint,
a firm "attachment" has been established... Heehee ♪

Yeah. They two trust each other very much.
I kind of envy them.

Right... Master Peppermint.
... I need to tell you something. See you in the Academy.

Huh... Huh huh!? Wait, Hazel!?
Can we just call it a day?

Hey, Hazel!?
Why did you take the "Frightening uni" away!?

Hey, are you going to use it on me...
Hazel!? My dear Hazel!! Lady Hazel!!
